android.pack
Class LocationDemo

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      android.pack.LocationDemo
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeoUpdateHandler
public class LocationDemo
extends Activity

LocationDemo is the main debugging class which Extends Activity meaning it's an activity type class and implements LocationListener which contains the location API tools. Please note that some of this class' feature are not fully implemented some of them being experimental implementations which are obsolete under different approaches. Note that the tolls position values are conserved within this class but they could be easily reimplemented to obtain the data from other sources, e.g. xml from DB.

Author:
silvian
